display_long_description:
Wisdom Watcher is the first clockpunk FPS in Virtual Reality, where you take part in epic battles against hordes of ancient demons. Equipped with a vast arsenal of weapons and magical cards, your task will be to survive and restore order in the astral universe.

Millennia-old legends will come to life as you confront monstrous entities inspired by European folklore within astral arenas. Only with courage, strategy, and targeted use of your resources can you hope to survive and return to the real world.

Are you ready to accept the challenge and climb the ranks on Leaderboard?  The fate of the universe is in your hands. 

Wisdom Watcher is still in development, this is a fully playable early access version. Join our Discord community (https://discord.gg/bCVKz57hMe) and be part of the development!

FEATURES:

VR Only with Stellar Performance:
Designed primarily for standalone VR, Wisdom Watcher lets you engage with hordes of over 20 mobs at once.

Competitive Leaderboards with Rewards:
Engage in monthly and seasonal challenges. Excel in the arenas and climb the leaderboards to earn exclusive rewards.

Diverse Gameplay Modes:
Each new arena introduces new gameplay modes, ensuring a fresh and exciting experience.

Customizable Arsenal and Card System:
Refine your combat style with an arsenal of upgradable weapons with unique characteristics and abilities. Utilize cards for passive skills or to build strategic items like barricades.
